item.name: Home
item.description: This Vegan Strawberry Shortcake is straight out of my childhood. When I was little, my mother used to buy me a strawberries and cream birthday cake from a famous Chicago bakery, Lutz. To my mom, there was no greater proof that we had “made it” in America than picking up a perfectly crafted cake, topped […]
